# Template Generation Skill

> **Source**: `.ai-agents/skills/template-generation.md`

This is a platform adapter for GitHub Copilot.

When this skill is invoked, load and execute the instructions from:
`.ai-agents/skills/template-generation.md`

## Quick Reference

- **Purpose**: Generate code from templates based on architecture design
- **Used By**: Developer
- **Full Documentation**: See source file above
